title: Jesus of Nazareth
creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
brief_description: This is a special catechetical edition of Zeffirelli’s film, divided into 14 distinct parts, running for a total time of 7 hours. Starring Robert Powell as Jesus Christ, Peter Ustinov as Herod, Olivia Hussey as the Virgin Mary, Michael York as John the Baptist, Anne Bancroft as Mary Magdelene, and James Farentino as the Apostle Peter, this is the tale of the life and death of Jesus Christ, from the time of his birth until his crucifixion.
creator_credit_for_label: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
